mapper.sql: uid, date_created, date_updated, email, is_profile_public, date_of_birth, full_name, gender, height, profile_photo_url, weight, goal_weight, goal_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from users
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into users (uid, date_created, date_updated, email, is_profile_public, date_of_birth, full_name, gender, height, profile_photo_url, weight, goal_weight, goal_date) values (#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isProfilePublic,jdbcType=BIT}, #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{profilePhotoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{goalWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{goalDate,jdbcType=DATE})
